ssot__SurveyInvitation__dlm.name: Survey Invitation
ssot__SurveyInvitation__dlm.description: The Survey Invitation DMO represents an invitation sent to a participant to complete a survey.

ssot__CanGuestUserRespond__c.description: An indicator if a guest user can respond to a survey invitation.

ssot__CanParticipantAccessResponse__c.description: An indicator if a participant can access their survey response.

ssot__CanParticipantRespondAnonymously__.description: An indicator if a participant can respond anonymously to a survey invitation.

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The date the record was created.

ssot__DateSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DateSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connectorâ€™s external object.

ssot__InviteExpiryDateTime__c.description: The date the survey invitation expires on.

ssot__InvitationLink__c.description: The link to the survey invitation.

ssot__LastModifiedDate__c.description: The date when a user last modified the record.

ssot__Name__c.description: The name of the survey invitation.

ssot__ParticipantId__c.description: A reference ID to the survey participant.

ssot__ParticipantObject__c.description: The object representing the survey participant.

ssot__SurveyId__c.description: A reference ID to the survey for the invitation.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as the primary key for the survey invitation DMO.

ssot__SurveyResponseStatus__c.description: The status of the survey response.
